Package controllers

Class EditContextOfSimulationController

java.lang.Object
controllers.EditContextOfSimulationController
public class EditContextOfSimulationController
extends java.lang.Object
This class acts as a controller for the EditContextOfSimulation.fxml It allows users to place users in a specific location/room of the house or block window movement

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EditContextOfSimulationController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initialize()
    Setup of table (columns) with attributes from the UserModel class and from the RoomModel class
    void onCancelClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When user clicks the Cancel button, the edit context of simulation stage will be close
    void onSaveClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When user clicks the save button, the edit context of simulation stage will be closed and the current location of each user as well as the window status of each room will be updated
    void setMaincontroller​(Main maincontroller, javafx.stage.Stage currentstage)
    Keeps an instance of Main in order to access the userData Keeps an instance of the currentStage to allow for stage transitions
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox setupLocationComboBox​(java.lang.String currentUserLocation)
    Setups a ComboBox for the location of each user in the tableView The ComboBox contains all locations that were obtained from the houseLayout file
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox setupOjectPresentComboBox​(boolean isWindowBlocked)
    Setups a ComboBox for the presence of an object for windows of each room in the tableView The ComboBox contains "Yes" and "No".

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public EditContextOfSimulationController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Setup of table (columns) with attributes from the UserModel class and from the RoomModel class

    • setMaincontroller

      public void setMaincontroller​(Main maincontroller, javafx.stage.Stage currentstage)
      Keeps an instance of Main in order to access the userData Keeps an instance of the currentStage to allow for stage transitions
      Parameters:
      maincontroller - instance of Main
      currentstage - stage that is currently displayed

    • setupLocationComboBox

      public javafx.scene.control.ComboBox setupLocationComboBox​(java.lang.String currentUserLocation)
      Setups a ComboBox for the location of each user in the tableView The ComboBox contains all locations that were obtained from the houseLayout file
      Parameters:
      currentUserLocation - the current location of a user in the house
      Returns:
      ComboBox with a value set at the current location of the user in the house

    • setupOjectPresentComboBox

      public javafx.scene.control.ComboBox setupOjectPresentComboBox​(boolean isWindowBlocked)
      Setups a ComboBox for the presence of an object for windows of each room in the tableView The ComboBox contains "Yes" and "No". "Yes" represents that an object is present on window "No" represents that an object is not present on window
      Parameters:
      isWindowBlocked - initial value of the ComboBox
      Returns:
      ComboBox of choice

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When user clicks the Cancel button, the edit context of simulation stage will be close
      Parameters:
      event - user clicks on cancel button

    • onSaveClick

      public void onSaveClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When user clicks the save button, the edit context of simulation stage will be closed and the current location of each user as well as the window status of each room will be updated
      Parameters:
      event - user clicks on save button
